body_content.explanation: very different to before, or changed very much, and therefore not able to be recognized:
examples: She returned to the United States to find a country that seemed almost unrecognizable from the one she had left as a young woman.
He had been beaten so severely that he was unrecognizable.

body_content.explanation: not clear enough or known well enough to be able to be recognized:
examples: The other picture was of an unrecognisable small boy, holding a hand up to the camera.
The truck was flying an unrecognizable flag.
